entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 7:06PM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Richland and east central Crawford Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 705 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Richland Center, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 7:05PM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Door County through 745 PM CDT... At 704 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sturgeon Bay, moving east at 35 mph. Additional storms over the Bay will move into the county the next hour. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 6:58PM CDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Portage County through 745 PM CDT... SOURCE...Radar indicated.
